name: Rise of Agon
description: installs corefonts, dinput8, and d3dx9.  use DXVK.
notes: journal/help page randomly crashes  the game.
content:
files:
- roa: https://www.riseofagon.com/documents/17/Darkfall_RoA_Installer.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Darkfall RoA/Darkfall_RoA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts dinput8 d3dx9
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: roa
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: DefaultConnectionSettings
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings\Connections
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 46 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
      00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
      00 00 00 00 00 00
system: {}
